con:config.script:
import com.eviware.soapui.impl.wsdl.teststeps.WsdlPropertiesTestStep import com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils import soap_pack.ExtCallScript
def conReg = ExtCallScript.createContext(testRunner, "registerOrderPreAuthValidation", "registerOrderPreAuth") def groovyUtils = new GroovyUtils(conReg) def conDep = ExtCallScript.createContext(testRunner, "depositOrderBusiness", "depositOrder") def groovyUtilsDep = new GroovyUtils(conDep) def conPay = ExtCallScript.createContext(testRunner, "paymentOrder", "paymentOrder") def groovyUtilsPay = new GroovyUtils(conPay)
ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "registerOrderPreAuthValidation", "generateCorrectXml") //Провести частичный депозит с указанием товара. Указан 1 товар из нескольких в оригинальном заказе ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "paymentOrder", "generateCorrectXml") ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "depositOrderBusiness", "generateCorrectXml") holder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder("registerOrderPreAuth#Request") def items = holder.getDomNode("//items").cloneNode(true); holder.getDomNode("//cartItems").appendChild(items) holder.setNodeValue("//items/@positionId", "хаха") holder.setNodeValue("//order/@amount", 30000) holder.updateProperty() ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "registerOrderPreAuthValidation", "registerOrderPreAuth") holder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder("registerOrderPreAuth#Response") def orderId = holder.getNodeValue("//return/@orderId") holder = groovyUtilsPay.getXmlHolder("paymentOrder#Request") holder.setNodeValue("//order/@orderId", orderId) holder.updateProperty() holder = groovyUtilsDep.getXmlHolder("depositOrder#Request") holder.setNodeValue("//order/@orderId", orderId) holder.updateProperty() ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "paymentOrder", "paymentOrder") holder.updateProperty() ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "depositOrderBusiness", "depositOrder") holder = groovyUtilsDep.getXmlHolder("depositOrder#Response") log.info "--- --- " + " errorCode=" +holder["//return/@errorCode"]+" errorMessage="+holder["//return/@errorMessage"]+ " "+ holder["//return/@orderId"]
log.info "=== Ready ==="

//Депозит на полную сумму без корзины +
import com.eviware.soapui.impl.wsdl.teststeps.WsdlPropertiesTestStep import com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils import soap_pack.ExtCallScript
def conReg = ExtCallScript.createContext(testRunner, "registerOrderPreAuthValidation", "registerOrderPreAuth") def groovyUtils = new GroovyUtils(conReg) def conDep = ExtCallScript.createContext(testRunner, "depositOrderBusiness", "depositOrder") def groovyUtilsDep = new GroovyUtils(conDep) def conPay = ExtCallScript.createContext(testRunner, "paymentOrder", "paymentOrder") def groovyUtilsPay = new GroovyUtils(conPay)
ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "registerOrderPreAuthValidation", "generateCorrectXml") ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "paymentOrder", "generateCorrectXml") ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "depositOrderBusiness", "generateCorrectXml") ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "registerOrderPreAuthValidation", "registerOrderPreAuth") holder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder("registerOrderPreAuth#Response") def orderId = holder.getNodeValue("//return/@orderId") holder = groovyUtilsPay.getXmlHolder("paymentOrder#Request") holder.setNodeValue("//order/@orderId", orderId) holder.updateProperty() holder = groovyUtilsDep.getXmlHolder("depositOrder#Request") holder.removeDomNodes("//depositItems") holder.setNodeValue("//order/@orderId", orderId) holder.updateProperty() ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "paymentOrder", "paymentOrder") ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "depositOrderBusiness", "depositOrder") holder = groovyUtilsDep.getXmlHolder("depositOrder#Response") log.info "--- --- " + " errorCode=" +holder["//return/@errorCode"]+" errorMessage="+holder["//return/@errorMessage"]
log.info "=== Ready ==="

//Депозит на полную сумму с корзиной +
import com.eviware.soapui.impl.wsdl.teststeps.WsdlPropertiesTestStep import com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils import soap_pack.ExtCallScript
def conReg = ExtCallScript.createContext(testRunner, "registerOrderPreAuthValidation", "registerOrderPreAuth") def groovyUtils = new GroovyUtils(conReg) def conDep = ExtCallScript.createContext(testRunner, "depositOrderBusiness", "depositOrder") def groovyUtilsDep = new GroovyUtils(conDep) def conPay = ExtCallScript.createContext(testRunner, "paymentOrder", "paymentOrder") def groovyUtilsPay = new GroovyUtils(conPay)
ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "registerOrderPreAuthValidation", "generateCorrectXml") ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "paymentOrder", "generateCorrectXml") ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "depositOrderBusiness", "generateCorrectXml") ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "registerOrderPreAuthValidation", "registerOrderPreAuth") holder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder("registerOrderPreAuth#Response") def orderId = holder.getNodeValue("//return/@orderId") holder = groovyUtilsPay.getXmlHolder("paymentOrder#Request") holder.setNodeValue("//order/@orderId", orderId) holder.updateProperty() holder = groovyUtilsDep.getXmlHolder("depositOrder#Request") holder.setNodeValue("//order/@orderId", orderId) holder.setNodeValue("//itemCurrency", "") holder.updateProperty() ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "paymentOrder", "paymentOrder") ExtCallScript.execTestStep (testRunner, "depositOrderBusiness", "depositOrder") holder = groovyUtilsDep.getXmlHolder("depositOrder#Response") log.info "--- --- " + " errorCode=" +holder["//return/@errorCode"]+" errorMessage="+holder["//return/@errorMessage"]+ " "+ holder["//return/@orderId"]
log.info "=== Ready ==="
